[b]Welcome to Guess the Pixel![/b]
[size=15]This is a guess the drawing game made with GDevelop.

initialVariables.value:
[b]Play with friends![/b]
[size=15]Paste the Room ID in the box below and press join.

events.comment:
Hello! Welcome to the magic inside Guess the Pixel!

Here's a simple guide of what these groups are for:

Client (Red)
➥ Connection to broker - Connects to broker and ICE servers
➥ Recieved events from Host - This is where the data that are recieved from the host are being handled like player data/list
➥ Disconnection - Removes the disconnected player from the player list and updates the player list

Host (Orange)
➥ Send player data to other clients (self explanatory)
➥ Game Settings - This is where settings such as Max Rounds and Drawing Time are handled

UI (Lime)
➥Player List - This is where the player list are created and updated
➥ Button hover and press - Hovering and pressing are handled here. This also where u can start and join a game
➥ Always running - This is where actions that are runned every frame like background parallex
Sets your player name depending on what you put in the Text Input
Makes a random player name at the beginning
This is for joining a game that has already started

events.name: Send player data to other clients

events.comment: So it doesn't connect to an already connected client (also not to connect yourself)
Starst the game and send other clients to the game scene
